title: Footprints of Mining Areas for the Years 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 and 2024
abstract: These footprints were analysed from Planet NICFI satellite imagery for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 and 2024. Raster layers of illicit mining areas were derived from these imagery.
